business.headline: Who is Shark Tank India's new judge Srikanth Bolla? All you need to knowSrikanth Bolla will now be part of Shark Tank India's panel that evaluates and invests in promising business ideas.

Explained: Why MobiKwik shares fell 15% to hit 52-week low todayMobiKwik stock price: The sharp fall in its share price came after its three-month IPO lock-in expired. As a result, 6% of the company's outstanding stock or 46 lakh shares became eligible for trading.

Rosmerta Digital files insolvency plea against Ola Electric. All you need to knowOla Electric shares slipped below Rs 50 for the first time, hitting a record low of Rs 46.94 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE).

Reliance Jio to end free IPL cricket streaming in India after 2 yearsThe company's new subscription plan starts at Rs 299 for mobile users. Those who opt for this plan will be able to watch IPL matches on JioHotstar, the recently formed streaming platform under the Reliance-Disney joint venture.
Citigroup plans to layoff 30% of IT contractors. Here's whyThis change is intended to enhance data security, improve risk management practices, and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.

NPS pension processing now similar to OPS rules. Check latest guidelinesNew guidelines have been introduced to speed up the pension processing process and to ensure that retired employees receive their pensions on time without any trouble.
SIP and SWP are not the same. Here's how they differSIP (Systematic Investment Plan) is a way to invest money in mutual funds at regular intervals, helping investors build wealth over time.

Ola Electric share price falls below Rs 50 after insolvency petition. What next?Ola Electric share price: Today's tumble came after the company revealed that an insolvency petition had been filed against its subsidiary, Ola Electric Technologies.

Fast-fashion retailer Forever 21 files for bankruptcy for 2nd time in 6 yearsForever 21 said it will conduct liquidation sales at its stores while simultaneously conducting a court‑supervised sale and marketing process for some or all of its assets.

IndusInd Bank share price gains 5% after RBI's statement. Buy or sell?The RBI's comments came after IndusInd Bank disclosed a 2.4% dent in its net worth due to a derivatives valuation issue. This triggered multiple downgrades, with analysts warning of a possible loss in the March quarter.

IRFC shares rise as company set to declare 2nd interim dividend todayIRFC has already fixed March 21, 2025, as the record date for the dividend. This means that shareholders who hold IRFC shares as of this date will be eligible for the payout, subject to approval by the board.

Can't save more than Rs 1,000? Here's where to invest it smartlySimply saving your money isn't enough, because its value keeps decreasing. The only way to stay ahead of rising prices is to invest, even if you can start with just Rs 1,000 a month.

Tata Motors share price rises after HSBC upgrade. 3 key takeaways for investorsTata Motors stock price: HSBC revised its target price to Rs 840, lower than its earlier estimate of Rs 930. Even with the cut, the new target suggests the stock could rise about 29% from current levels.

Explained: Why IndusInd Bank shares jumped 7% in early trade todayIndusInd Bank shares initially rose around 7% in early trade to reach a day's high of Rs 707.75 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). At around 9:45 am, shares of the company were up 4.59% to Rs 702.95.

Sensex jumps 500 points: 3 reasons why the stock market is rising today?Sensex jumped over 500 points while Nifty gained over 150 points to go past the 22,500 mark. As of 9:35 AM, the S&P BSE Sensex was up 544.92 points to 74,373.83, while NSE Nifty50 added 169.65 points to 22,567.15.

Will Trump's reciprocal tariffs hit India hard? Here's all you need to knowIndian exporters are worried about US reciprocal tariffs, but a new report from SBI Research has indicated that the impact will be limited.
Sensex, Nifty jumps in early trade; IndusInd Bank gains 4%The S&P BSE Sensex was up 362.75 points to 74,191.66, while the NSE Nifty50 added 121 points to 22,518.20 as of 9:25 AM.

IndusInd Bank, BSE among 5 stocks in F&O ban list today. Details hereIndusInd Bank, BSE, and SAIL are among five stocks in NSE's F&O ban list as trading limits breach thresholds. Shares of IndusInd Bank are likely to be in focus after the RBI stepped in to address concerns about the lender.

Sensex, Nifty opening on March 17: What to expect from markets todayExperts say that factors like falling crude oil prices, the easing of the Dollar Index, and expectations of a recovery in domestic earnings could support market stability, despite global trade worries.

Stocks to watch on March 17: TCS, Tata Motors, VoltasFor the trading session on March 17, stocks of companies such as Dr Reddy's, Shilpa Medicare, Voltas, TCS, and Tata Motors will be in focus due to key corporate developments.

Infosys agrees to pay $17.5 million to settle lawsuits over US cyber incidentInfosys first disclosed the cyber incident in a stock exchange filing in November 2023. The company said it was working with a cybersecurity products provider to resolve the issue and had launched an independent investigation to assess its impact.

Gold hits $3,000 for first time: Trade tensions and Fed bets drive rallyGold surged past $3,000 an ounce for the first time, driven by trade tensions, recession fears, and Fed rate cut bets. Analysts expect further gains, with prices potentially reaching $3,050 in 2025.

Mutual fund inflows at 10-month low: Here are 3 alternate investment optionsThe total assets under management (AUM) of the mutual fund industry fell 4%, from Rs 66.98 lakh crore in January to Rs 64.26 lakh crore in February.

Elon Musk's Tesla warns of tariff risks in letter to Trump administrationIn an unsigned letter to the Donald Trump-led administration, his ally Elon Musk's Tesla has cautioned that the US President's trade war could expose the automaker to retaliatory tariffs and increase the cost of making electric vehicles in America.
Tesla planning low-cost Model Y in China. Will India get it too?Production will take place at Tesla's Shanghai factory, its largest production hub, and mass production is expected to begin in 2026.
Intel shares jump 15% as investors welcome new CEO Lip-Bu TanIntel shares closed at $23.70, jumping 14.60% as investors placed their bet on the newly announced CEO.

Holi 2025 stock ideas: These 2 shares could deliver up to 16% gainsFor Holi 2025, Bajaj Broking has recommended two stocks that could see a 16% upside in the next 12 months amid a market correction that has seen Sensex and Nifty on a downward trend.

Sensex, Nifty outlook: Can domestic triggers lift market sentiment next week?Sensex dropped 200.85 points, closing at 73,828.91, while Nifty lost 73.30 points. The market remained volatile, with Nifty closing below 22,400 after fluctuating throughout the session.

Wall Street indices slip as Trump's EU tariff threat raises concernsAt the opening bell, the S&P 500 dipped 0.9 points, or 0.09%, at the open to 5,594.45​, the Dow Jones Industrial Average dropped 70.9 points, or 0.17%, at the open to 41,280.05 and Nasdaq Composite fell 49.9 points, or 0.28%, to 17,598.565.
Old share certificates in your drawer? Here's how you can encash themThe stock value of old shares can be calculated by multiplying the number of stocks held by the current market price.

Check SBI's latest lending rates for March 2025: MCLR and base rateThe updated MCLR rates will directly influence interest rates on various financial products, including home loans, personal loans, and other credit facilities offered by the bank.

BSE, NSE holiday: Is stock market closed for Holi on March 14, 2025?Since there is some uncertainty over whether Holi 2025 falls on Friday or Saturday, it is important to check the official list of stock market holidays for clarity.

Policies are a nightmare: Nithin Kamath on why life insurance is getting tougherSince the onset of COVID-19, insurance companies have faced an increase in claims, which has led them to reassess their underwriting policies and tighten their approval process.

Sensex, Nifty erase early gains to end lower; Auto, IT stocks weigh on marketsThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 200.85 points to end at 73,828.91, while the NSE Nifty50 was down by 73.30 points to close at 22,397.20.

Does it make sense to stop investing in mutual funds amid market correction?Sensex and Nifty are down nearly 15% from their September all-time highs as volatility continues to make its presence felt, and market correction is the flavour being served on Dalal Street.

March 15 advance tax deadline: Are you required to pay?Salaried individuals, freelancers, and businesses must pay advance tax if their total tax liability (after TDS/TCS) exceeds Rs 10,000 in FY 2024-25.

Filing your advance tax? Here's how to calculate itAdvance tax is applicable when the total tax liability for a financial year exceeds Rs 10,000. It is computed based on the estimated income for the year and paid in instalments as per the due dates.

Is your UPI linked to an inactive mobile number? Here's how NPCI protects youBy March 31, 2025, all banks and payment service providers (PSPs) offering UPI services must update their databases to remove inactive or recycled mobile numbers. The move aims to reduce errors and prevent fraud caused by mobile number churn.
Airtel and Jio team up with SpaceX to bring Starlink: What it means for telcosSpaceX is still awaiting permission from the government to officially launch Starlink's services in the country.

Is Form 16 necessary for ITR filing? What to do if you don't have it?Form 16 provides details of the deducted tax amount and submission date and helps in ITR filing by ensuring accurate income and tax details, reducing the chances of errors.

entertainment.headline: After CID, Crime Patrol begins to stream on Netflix, fans reactCrime Patrol, the iconic true-crime series on Sony TV, is now available to stream on Netflix. Fans reacted to the announcement.

Kim Soo-hyun-Kim Sae-ron controversy: Exposing Korean industry's double standardsThe controversy involving South Korean actors Kim Soo-hyun and the late Kim Sae-ron has opened a Pandora's box of issues within the entertainment industry, from age-gap relationships to the treatment of disgraced celebrities. As the public grapples with these revelations, the debate continues to rage on about ethics, consent, and gender double standards.

Kim Soo-hyun's agency acts against Indian blogger for unauthorised contentIn a dramatic turn of events, actor Kim Soo-hyun's agency has initiated legal proceedings against an Indian influencer. The influencer shared emails from the agency, revealing that he was threatened for posting 'unauthorised' content.

Hina Khan performs Umrah amid cancer battle, says she's 'overwhelmed, speechless'Actor Hina Khan performed Umrah amid her cancer battle. She shared emotional moments from Mecca on Instagram. Accompanied by her brother, the actor expressed gratitude and prayed for strength while documenting her journey.

Kim Soo-hyun's scenes cut from 'Good Day' following Kim Sae-ron controversyK-drama actor Kim Soo-hyun's scenes from MBC's variety program 'Good Day' were edited after Kim Sae-ron controversy. The production house shared a statement and confirmed the same.

TV actor Erica Fernandes says Do Patti triggered memories of abusive relationshipActor Erica Fernandes shared her experience of physical abuse in a past relationship, highlighting how films like Do Patti resurfaced painful memories. Despite the challenges, she opened up about her journey towards healing and the societal pressures that kept her silent.

Sidhu Moose Wala's little brother's Holi pic goes viral. Seen yet?A viral photo of Sidhu Moose Wala's little brother, Shubhdeep, dressed in traditional attire with Holi colours on his cheeks, has captured the hearts of fans on social media.

All Of Us Are Dead actor Lomon on India: I think of Taj Mahal and Bengal TigersSouth Korean actor Lomon, known for his role in All of Us Are Dead, discussed his latest project Family Matters and shared insights on his career and inspirations in an exclusive interview with India Today Digital.

Hina Khan shares pic of discoloured nails: Most common side effect of chemotherapyTelevision actor Hina Khan opened up about the side effects of chemotherapy on her nails, sharing a glimpse of the discolouration.

Saira Banu says she shouldn't be called AR Rahman's ex-wife: We're not divorcedSaira Banu, wife of AR Rahman, clarifies that they are separated but not divorced, addressing recent rumours. She cites her health issues as a reason and wishes Rahman well.

Priyanka Chahar Choudhary-Ankit Gupta unfollow each other, fans speculate break-upTelevision actors Priyanka Chahar Choudhary and Ankit Gupta, known for their chemistry on Udaariyaan, have unfollowed each other on Instagram, sparking rumours about their relationship status.

AR Rahman discharged from hospital, son shares health updateAR Rahman's son Ameen shared an update on the music maestro's health, explaining his hospitalisation was due to dehydration. He assured fans that Rahman is now recovering well. India Today Digital has learnt that the composer has also been discharged.

Watch: Actor Aamir Ali plays Holi with girlfriend Ankita KukretiTelevision actor Aamir Ali was seen celebrating Holi with his girlfriend Ankita Kukreti.  The couple's public appearance comes after Aamir confirmed his relationship status in a recent interview.

Ted Lasso returns: Jason Sudeikis show renewed for fourth seasonApple TV+ has renewed Ted Lasso for a fourth season with Jason Sudeikis leading the charge once more. The new season will introduce Ted coaching a women's football team.

Singer Shawn Mendes says 'dhanyawad' to India after Lollapalooza performanceSinger Shawn Mendes visited India for Lollapalooza 2025 and is currently in the nation, expressing his gratitude through social media post. He especially appreciated Mumbai.

Stand-up comic Zakir Khan treats Hasan Minhaj with delicious Indore foodZakir Khan hosted Hasan Minhaj in Indore, introducing him to the city's street food culture and hinting at a future collaboration.

Kim Soo-hyun removed as Prada's brand ambassador amid Kim Sae-ron scandal: ReportK-drama star Kim Soo-hyun has reportedly been removed as luxury brand Prada's brand ambassador following his alleged involvement in actor Kim Sae-ron's death scandal.

The Potato Lab review: Kang Tae-oh, Lee Sun-bin lead this quirky comedyReleased-Sat Mar 01, 2025The Potato Lab is a fun K-drama set in a picturesque mountain valley. While it offers laughs and visual appeal, it sometimes lacks depth and originality.

Exploring age gaps in K-dramas: Why do they cause so much buzz?K-dramas often feature age differences between lead actors, sparking debate among fans. While such gaps are common in real life, they draw more attention on screen. In this K-Fix, we will find out why do they matter so much.

general news.headline: Trump to speak to Putin as Russia demands 'ironclad' guarantees for Ukraine dealRussia is demanding 'ironclad' security guarantees in a peace treaty with Ukraine to end the three-year war, as talks advance on a US-proposed 30-day ceasefire.

Minutes before Vadodara crash: CCTV footage reveals accused, friend's activitiesNew CCTV footage showed the Vadodara crash accused and his friend minutes before the crash, where he allegedly drove intoxicated, killing a woman and injuring four others on Friday.

Trump declares pardons issued by Joe Biden void: Done by autopenPresident Donald Trump has voided Joe Biden's last-minute pardons, claiming they were signed by an autopen without Biden's approval and may involve criminal misconduct.

She hid gold wherever…: BJP MLA's vulgar remark against Ranya RaoKarnataka BJP MLA Basangouda Patil Yatnal, who made a vulgar remark against actor Ranya Rao, also said that state ministers are involved in the case and that he will expose them in the Assembly.

March Madness as Balochistan blows upMarch has been a fireworks display in Pakistan's north and south, and the military is running around like a headless chicken. Baloch rebels launched 57 attacks in the last 48 hours. A lethal combo has got the secessionists humming "mauka, mauka".

After Indian Columbia student flees, Elon Musk endorses self-deportation appRanjani Srinivasan, an Indian Columbia student, used the CBP Home App, launched by the Donald Trump administration to allow individuals to lawfully 'self-deport', avoiding the risk of arrest and detention.

Army officer, son allege 45-minute thrashing by Punjab cops with baseball batsThree Patiala Police officials allegedly assaulted a senior Army officer and his son in Patiala for 45 minutes, leaving the officer with a fractured arm and his son with head injuries.

After aide's murder, Pak boosts security for LeT chief Hafiz Saeed: SourcesFollowing the murder of LeT terrorist Abu Qatal, Pakistan has heightened security for 26/11 plotter Hafiz Saeed and his son Talha Saeed, amid a series of attacks on Saeed's close associates.
Why your mattress matters: The science behind quality sleepWhile adults spend nearly a third of their lives sleeping, the role of mattresses in sleep quality has often been overlooked.

Supreme Court fines resident Rs 1 lakh for case against road in AurovilleSupreme Court fined an Auroville resident Rs 1 lakh for obstructing development and overturned High Court and National Green Tribunal orders stalling road projects. The ruling will allow Auroville Foundation to resume its planned developmental activities in the township.

Influencer Orry, 7 others face charges for drinking at Vaishno Devi base campJ&K police on Monday filed an FIR against Bollywood influencer Orry, and seven others, including a Russian national, for allegedly consuming alcohol at a hotel in Katra, near Vaishno Devi shrine.

Trump shares link to PM's podcast with Lex Fridman in surprise endorsementDuring his conversation with Lex Fridman, PM Modi recalled key moments with Donald Trump, including the 2019 "Howdy Modi" event, his White House visit, and last year's assassination attempt.

How did Gauri Spratt fall in love with Aamir Khan? She answersGauri Spratt lists the reasons that made her fall in love with Aamir Khan. The superstar introduced his live-in partner to the media last week ahead of his 60th birthday celebration.

Why the South is resisting the Delimitation ExerciseThe South's efforts to preserve its political voice, federal autonomy, and economic contributions at odds with the North's cries of under-representation

Annamalai, Tamilisai Soundararajan detained ahead of protest over liquor scamTamil Nadu BJP leaders, including current and previous state chiefs K Annamalai and Tamilisai Soundararajan, were detained ahead of their planned protest against the alleged Rs 1,000 crore TASMAC liquor scam.

Nasa reveals astronauts' return date, Sunita Williams says 'Be back before long'Nasa has confirmed that astronauts Sunita Williams and Butch Wilmore, stranded on the ISS for over nine months due to Starliner spacecraft issues, will return to Earth on Tuesday. Their ocean splashdown near Florida is set for 3:27 am IST on March 19, rescheduled from Wednesday for better weather conditions.

Delhi man spots Zomato delivery agent eating customer's food, shares story behind itAt first, the man assumed that the Zomato delivery agent was eating food meant for a customer. It was only after speaking to the agent that he understood the story behind it.

PM Modi's podcast with Lex Fridman fails to impress Congress: Fully scriptedPM Modi discussed a range of topics, including his childhood, Gujarat riots as well as his friendship with US President Donald Trump during his podcast with American scientist Lex Fridman.

Mahindra XUV700 Ebony limited edition launched at Rs 19.64 lakhThe XUV700 Ebony is available across the top-spec AX7 and AX7 L variants in petrol MT/AT and diesel MT/AT powertrains.

No silly Oscar, we have National Awards: Kangana Ranaut on EmergencyKangana Ranaut's Emergency released on Netflix recently and has been receiving polarising reviews on social media. A fan said that Emergency should be sent for Oscar and Kangana rejected the Academy Award calling it silly.

Terrorist killed after gunbattle with security forces in J&K's KupwaraSecurity forces engaged in a fierce gunbattle with terrorists in Jammu and Kashmir. A terrorist was neutralised during the joint operation by the Indian Army, police, and Special Operations Group.

Baloch insurgents release first visuals of attack on Pakistan military convoyThe Majeed Brigade, along with another BLA's unit, Fateh Squad, targeted a military convoy, comprising eight buses, one of which was completely destroyed in the explosion in Balochistan's Noshki, said the BLA in an official statement earlier in the day.

Ola Electric share price falls below Rs 50 after insolvency petition. What next?Ola Electric share price: Today's tumble came after the company revealed that an insolvency petition had been filed against its subsidiary, Ola Electric Technologies.

Telugu actor Vishwak Sen's house robbed: Cash, gold and diamond jewellery stolenA burglary occurred at Telugu actor Vishwak Sen's home in Hyderabad on March 16. Reportedly, Rs 2 lakh worth cash and jewellery were stolen.

Taapsee Pannu wraps Gandhari shooting: A burnout like never beforeActor Taapsee Pannu has wrapped the shooting of her upcoming film, Gandhari. She shared a bunch of pictures from the set along with a note.

Belgian actor Emilie Dequenne dies at 43 due to rare cancerEmilie Dequenne, the acclaimed Belgian actor, died due to a rare cancer at the age of 43. Known for her role in 'Rosetta', she left behind a legacy in French cinema.

Prabhas's Baahubali to re-release in July on 10th anniversary: ReportReportedly, SS Rajamouli's Baahubali: The Beginning is set to re-release in theatres on its 10th anniversary. The film starred Prabhas, Rana Daggubati, Tamannaah Bhatia, Anushka Shetty, among others.

sports.headline: Rohit Sharma is my dream captain, want to play under him once: Shashank SinghPunjab Kings batter Shashank Singh has said that Rohit Sharma is his dream captain and wants to play under the Mumbai Indians legend at least once in his career. Rohit is the joint-most successful captain in IPL history.

Stubbs answersDelhi Capitals batter Tristan Stubbs opened up shared his thoughts about the ideal opening combination for their team in the upcoming Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025). The youngster also expressed excitement ahead of sharing the dressing room with Faf du Plessis.

KKR's Moeen Ali doesn't find Harry Brook's IPL ban harsh: Messed his team upKKR all-rounder Moeen Ali doesn't find Harry Brook's IPL ban harsh as he feels the England batter has messed up DC's plan for the upcoming IPL 2025 season by withdrawing just before the start of the season. Brook was bought by Delhi for 6.5 crore rupees during the mega auction.

Manchester United's Fernandes reacts to Keane criticism: I do things my wayManchester United captain Bruno Fernandes responded to the criticism from Roy Keane and claimed that he does things his way and has immense respect for the club legend. Fernandes has been in red-hot form for United in recent weeks.

Watch: Virat Kohli begins practicing for IPL 2025 with intense net sessionRoyal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) batter Virat Kohli has begun practicing for upcoming Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) through an intense net session.

IPL 2025: When Umran Malik proved Dale Steyn 'wrong' with 155 kmph thunderboltDale Steyn recalled how Umran Malik once proved him wrong by bowling a 155 kmph yorker and going against his advice. Umran enjoyed a fruitful time under Steyn's guidance at SRH in 2022.

The final loss rounded off a horrible week for Liverpool as they crashed out of the Champions League as well.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
